Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Structural fatigue crack at stress point. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Foreign object damage to critical surface
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Access Panels component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 11/11/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni
